fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each Night, choose a player (other than yourself) and learn their feedback message.
- Each Day, submit a full list of each player and the feedback message you think they received last night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of each night, you will receive a randomly ordered list of every player's feedback message, without knowing which player each one belongs to. No effect can prevent you from seeing this list, except for you being dead.
- If a player would receive multiple feedback messages that night, they will be combined into a single message on your list.
- While you live, every player will not see any feedback message that they normally would, and you won't know which message in your list is yours. Your list will be the only source of feedback.
- At the end of each day you submit a list, you will only learn only the number of guesses that were correct.
- Regardless of how many were correct, each player will receive the message you assigned to them. If you instead submit no list, players will receive nothing.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Submit at least a single list where every feedback message is assigned to the correct player.
